news.title: Four killed in Kyiv in new Russian aerial attack
news.summary: Russian missiles and drones hit residential areas and hospitals in Ukraine's capital, the interior minister says.

news.title: First celestial image unveiled from revolutionary telescope
news.summary: The telescope should detect killer asteroids and may even find the ninth planet in our solar system.

news.title: Our sister died because of our mum's cancer conspiracy theories, say brothers
news.summary: Paloma Shemirani’s brothers say she refused chemotherapy because of their mother’s beliefs.

news.title: Could Ketamine on the NHS help treat severe depression?
news.summary: Ketamine is linked to serious health problems but some believe it can be used to treat depression.

news.title: The Papers: 'Iran vows revenge' and 'Stick it up your bunker'
news.summary: US strikes on nuclear sites in Iran dominate Monday's front pages.

news.title: Bride shot dead in attack on French wedding party
news.summary: A suspected attacker is also killed in an apparent exchange of fire during the incident in a village near Avignon.
